mapper.select: SELECT AGT_GROUP, AGT_TEAM, AGT_BLEND, AGT_TOTAL, AGT_LOGIN, AGT_READY, AGT_NOT_READY, AGT_OTHER_WORK, AGT_AFTER_CALL_WORK, AGT_ETC, AGT_BUSY_IN_SUM, AGT_BUSY_OUT_SUM, AGT_BUSY_IN, AGT_BUSY_IN_HOLD, AGT_BUSY_OUT, AGT_BUSY_OUT_HOLD, AGT_BUSY_INT, AGT_BUSY_CONS, AGT_BUSY_TRAN, AGT_BUSY_CONF, AGT_BUSY_ETC, AGT_DID, AGT_DID_HOLD, AGT_DOD, AGT_DOD_HOLD, AGT_DD_INT, AGT_DD_CONS, AGT_DD_TRAN, AGT_DD_CONF, AGT_DD_ETC, AGT_AUTOSET_READY, AGT_TENANT, CENTER, AGT_ALERTIN_SUM, AGT_ALERT_OUT_SUM, AS_LAST_UPDATE FROM TB_AS
